quoteText:
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16, or equivalent minimum age in the relevant jurisdiction, unless their parent provided verifiable consent.
If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under 16, or equivalent minimum age in the relevant jurisdiction, without consent of their parent, we will take steps to delete this information as soon as possible.
Parents or guardians can contact us at support@taskade.com
title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
